Package ohos.media.recorder

Class Recorder.OrientationHint

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.media.recorder.Recorder.OrientationHint
  • Enclosing class:
    Recorder

    public static final class Recorder.OrientationHint
extends Object
    Describes the rotation angle used during video playback.

    The rotation angle can be 0, 90, 180, or 270 degrees. This class applies to video playback scenarios.

    Since:
    1

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int FIRST_PLAYBACK_DERGREE
      Indicates that the angle is rotated by 0 degrees during video playback.
      static int FOURTH_PLAYBACK_DERGREE
      Indicates that the angle is rotated by 270 degrees during video playback.
      static int SECOND_PLAYBACK_DERGREE
      Indicates that the angle is rotated by 90 degrees during video playback.
      static int THIRD_PLAYBACK_DERGREE
      Indicates that the angle is rotated by 180 degrees during video playback.
